[[Image:Pidgin Screenshot Ubuntu.png|thumb|200px|left|Pidgin's tabbed chat window in [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]]]
Pidgin is a graphical [[Front-end and back-end#Computer science|front-end]] for libpurple using [[GTK+]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://developer.pidgin.im/wiki/WhatIsLibpurple |title=What Is Libpurple - Pidgin - Trac |publisher=Pidgin.im |accessdate=2009-03-22}}</ref> Libpurple is notable for its support for multiple instant messaging [[Network protocol|protocols]].
Pidgin is a graphical [[Front-end and back-end#Computer science|front-end]] for libpurple using [[GTK+]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://developer.pidgin.im/wiki/WhatIsLibpurple |title=What Is Libpurple - Pidgin - Trac |publisher=Pidgin.im |accessdate=2009-03-22}}</ref> Libpurple is notable for its support for multiple instant messaging [[Network protocol|protocols]].
